commands.name: help
commands.description: Displays a categorized list of all bot commands along with basic usage information.

commands.name: profile
commands.description: Displays your Discord user profile related to the bot, including saved data and settings.

commands.name: key
commands.summary: Manage your Clash of Clans API key
commands.description: Allows you to set, view, or remove your Clash of Clans Developer API key used by the bot.
